text: Some time yesterday, I got a text message.
A friend of mine invited me to a party.
I recall being very excited because it had been a long time since I last was invited to a party.
Did this happen whilst commuting to it?
No, it didn't. I remember getting there without a scratch.
Ugh, I feel so weak, I can't even call for help...
It must have happend during my stay there.
But what happened at the party?
I only remember it being called an experience I have never ever had before by my friend.
